This broadcast receiver declares an intent-filter for a protected broadcast action string, which can only be sent by the system, not third-party applications. However, the receiver's onReceive method does not appear to call getAction to ensure that the received Intent's action string matches the expected value, potentially making it possible for another actor to send a spoofed intent with no action string or a different action string and cause undesired behavior. In this case, it is possible that the onReceive method passed the received Intent to another method that checked the action string. If so, this finding can safely be ignored.

issue.message: Replace "..." with ellipsis character (, …) ?
Replace "..." with ellipsis character (, …) ?
The following images appear in both `-nodpi` and in a density folder: preview_dots.png

The image `bot_file.png` varies significantly in its density-independent (dip) size across the various density versions: drawable-hdpi/bot_file.png: 21x27 dp (32x40 px), drawable-mdpi/bot_file.png: 21x26 dp (21x26 px), drawable-xhdpi/bot_file.png: 16x20 dp (32x40 px), drawable-xxhdpi/bot_file.png: 21x27 dp (64x80 px)

The image `brightness_high.png` varies significantly in its density-independent (dip) size across the various density versions: drawable-hdpi/brightness_high.png: 24x24 dp (36x36 px), drawable-mdpi/brightness_high.png: 24x24 dp (24x24 px), drawable-xhdpi/brightness_high.png: 18x18 dp (36x36 px), drawable-xxhdpi/brightness_high.png: 24x24 dp (72x72 px)

The image `burn.png` varies significantly in its density-independent (dip) size across the various density versions: drawable-hdpi/burn.png: 18x24 dp (27x36 px), drawable-mdpi/burn.png: 18x24 dp (18x24 px), drawable-xhdpi/burn.png: 25x35 dp (50x69 px), drawable-xxhdpi/burn.png: 18x24 dp (54x72 px)

The image `call_arrow_right.png` varies significantly in its density-independent (dip) size across the various density versions: drawable-hdpi/call_arrow_right.png: 16x20 dp (24x30 px), drawable-mdpi/call_arrow_right.png: 16x20 dp (16x20 px), drawable-xhdpi/call_arrow_right.png: 2x2 dp (3x4 px), drawable-xxhdpi/call_arrow_right.png: 16x20 dp (48x60 px)

The image `delete.png` varies significantly in its density-independent (dip) size across the various density versions: drawable-hdpi/delete.png: 9x9 dp (13x13 px), drawable-mdpi/delete.png: 10x10 dp (10x10 px), drawable-xhdpi/delete.png: 10x10 dp (20x20 px), drawable-xxhdpi/delete.png: 10x10 dp (30x30 px)

The image `devices.png` varies significantly in its density-independent (dip) size across the various density versions: drawable-hdpi/devices.png: 60x42 dp (90x63 px), drawable-mdpi/devices.png: 90x63 dp (90x63 px), drawable-xhdpi/devices.png: 90x63 dp (180x125 px), drawable-xxhdpi/devices.png: 90x63 dp (270x188 px)
